item.title: CVE-2022-47588|2024-08-03T14:55:08.389Z -- tips%20and%20tricks%20hq%2C%20peter%20petreski -- simple%20photo%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Tips and Tricks HQ, Peter Petreski Simple Photo Gallery simple-photo-gallery allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Simple Photo Gallery: from n/a through v1.8.1.
